title: What can you tell me about Wilmington Island GA.  Along with Johnny Mercer road on the same Island?
text:
Wilmington Island, Ga., is a barrier island off of Savannah, Ga.



Here's a humorous look at the history of the island:
http://www.relohomesearch.com/USA/Wilmington_Island/GA/AreaInfo-2403.aspx



And here's a just-facts site:
http://www.city-data.com/city/Wilmington-Island-Georgia.html



Johnny Mercer Boulevard is named for singer Johnny Mercer, who was
born in Savannah. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Johnny_Mercer
